Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near 95th/Union
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Ashland and 95th due to street blockage near 95th/Union.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, State, 87th, Ashland and 95th due to street blockage near 95th/Union.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
